text: Mo Ostin (born Morris Meyer Ostrofsky; March 27, 1927 â€“ July 31, 2022) was an American record executive. He worked for many companies, including Verve, Reprise Records, Warner Bros. Records, and DreamWorks. He was honored into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2003. Ostin died on July 31, 2022, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American record producers Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Mo Ostin
